name: ACH_THE_CHOPPER
description: Score two melee frags with a single melee attack

name: ACH_TALK_TO_THE_HAND
description: Frag an enemy with their own ink bomb by reflecting it with your melee weapon. You must survive the ink bomb explosion.

name: ACH_SWISS_ARMY_KNIFE
description: Score two frags with one melee attack--one as a melee frag and the other by reflecting scissors. All players must start with only one pair of scissors.

name: ACH_THE_BOUNCER
description: Frag an enemy by bouncing your own ink bomb with your melee weapon. You must survive the ink bomb explosion.

name: ACH_NO_REST_FOR_THE_WICKED
description: Win a 4-player Free For All or Team Free For All match with default rules in under 45 seconds. The score threshold must be at least 10. All 4 players must be actively playing for the whole duration of the match.

name: ACH_UNSTOPPABLE
description: Win a 4-player Free For All or Team Free For All match with default rules without being fragged. The score threshold must be at least 10. All 4 players must be actively playing for the whole duration of the match.

name: ACH_FLAGBEARER
description: In Capture the Quill, frag an enemy who is carrying your flag and return your flag, all while carrying their flag, and score a point without their flag being returned.

name: ACH_LONGER_LIVE_THE_KING
description: Survive 12 seconds as King in 4-player match of Long Live the King. All 4 players must be actively playing for the whole duration of the match.

name: ACH_NINE_LIVES
description: Win a 4-player match of Survival or Team Survival with at least 9 lives remaining. All 4 players must be actively playing for the whole duration of the match.

name: ACH_MAYHEM_MACHINE
description: Frag 3 enemies with a single ink bomb. You must survive the explosion. Each player must start with only 1 ink bomb.
